Desc.eng: Van Helsing, you are back! That was quick, bless your heart!
I’m afraid we can’t celebrate yet. The Palace of Machines is surrounded by impenetrable force walls. We can’t get to the Professor yet.
Oh, I see. And you thought that I would know the trick of disarming those walls. Now that is sweet. And no, I can’t help you. It’s a new technology, devised by a true genius.
We only need you to tell us where to go and which levers to pull. We’ll take care of everything else.
I can tell you one thing. I know where you can find the man who invented those walls. Go to the Industrial Port and seek the lab of Nikkola Telsa.
But that is what I was talking about! That’s all we needed. Bye!
Oh, that’s sweet. Will you tell him or should I?
